chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq ", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines: Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts. Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'. Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary. Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided. Example 1: Hypotheses: n, m: nat IHn: m + n = n + m Goal: m + S n = S n + m Proof: ```coq simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto. Qed.``` Example 2: Hypotheses: Goal: forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m ```coq intros n m. induction n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto. Qed.``` Solve This Proof State: Hypotheses: X: Type Y: Type R: X -> Y -> Prop l2: list X l1: list X m: list Y Goal: Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) m -> {m1 : list Y & {m2 : list Y | Forall2 R l1 m1 /\ Forall2 R l2 m2 /\ m = m1 ++ m2}} Premises: Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename Forall2 : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> Prop) -> list A -> list B -> Prop Forall2_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (x : X) (l : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: m) < -> R x y /\ Forall2 R l m Forall2_nil_inv_l : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (m : list Y), Forall2 R nil m -> m = nil Forall2_nil_inv_r : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (m : list X), Forall2 R m nil -> m = nil Forall2_mono : forall (X Y : Type) (R S : X -> Y -> Prop), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), R x y -> S x y) -> forall (l : list X) (m : list Y), Forall2 R l m -> Forall2 S l m ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop l1 : list X l2 : list X m : list Y |- Type] ?i : [X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop l1 : list X l2 : list X m : list Y |- ?I] ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop l1 : list X l2 : list X m : list Y |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop l1 : list X l2 : list X m : list Y |- ?T -> Prop] Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2' Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2') Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2 flat_map_app_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> list Y) (l : list X) (r1 : list Y) (y : Y) (r2 : list Y), flat_map f l = r1 ++ y :: r2 -> exists (l1 : list X) (m1 : list Y) (x : X) (m2 : list Y) (l2 : list X), l = l1 ++ x :: l2 /\ f x = m1 ++ y :: m2 /\ r1 = flat_map f l1 ++ m1 /\ r2 = m2 ++ flat_map f l2 prefix_app_lft_inv : forall (X : Type) (l1 l2 m : list X), l1 ++ l2

{m2 : list X | m = l1 ++ m2 /\ l2

Y) (ll : list X) (m n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ n -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ m = map f l /\ n = map f r}} flat_map_app : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> list Y) (l1 l2 : list X), flat_map f (l1 ++ l2) = flat_map f l1 ++ flat_map f l2 map_middle_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m : list Y) (y : Y) (n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ y :: n -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ map f l = m /\ f x = y /\ map f r = n}}} Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') map_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\ f x = y /\ map f l = m}} Permutation_Forall2 : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l1' : list A) (l2 : list B), l1 ~p l1' -> Forall2 P l1 l2 -> exists l2' : list B, l2 ~p l2' /\ Forall2 P l1' l2' map_duplicate_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (l' : list Y) (y1 : Y) (m' : list Y) (y2 : Y) (r' : list Y), map f ll = l' ++ y1 :: m' ++ y2 :: r' -> {l : list X & {x1 : X & {m : list X & {x2 : X & {r : list X | l' = map f l /\ y1 = f x1 /\ m' = map f m /\ y2 = f x2 /\ r' = map f r /\ ll = l ++ x1 :: m ++ x2 :: r}}}}} Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0 Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0 list_app_eq_inv : forall (X : Type) (l1 l2 r1 r2 : list X), l1 ++ r1 = l2 ++ r2 -> {m : list X | l1 ++ m = l2 /\ r1 = m ++ r2} + {m : list X | l2 ++ m = l1 /\ r2 = m ++ r1} list_app_cons_eq_inv : forall (X : Type) (l1 l2 r1 r2 : list X) (x : X), l1 ++ r1 = l2 ++ x :: r2 -> {m : list X | l1 ++ m = l2 /\ r1 = m ++ x :: r2} + {m : list X | l2 ++ x :: m = l1 /\ r2 = m ++ r1} Forall2_refl : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil list_split_middle : forall (X : Type) (l1 : list X) (x1 : X) (r1 l2 : list X) (x2 : X) (r2 : list X), ~ In x1 l2 -> ~ In x2 l1 -> l1 ++ x1 :: r1 = l2 ++ x2 :: r2 -> l1 = l2 /\ x1 = x2 /\ r1 = r2 list_cons_app_cons_eq_inv : forall (X : Type) (l2 r1 r2 : list X) (x y : X), x :: r1 = l2 ++ y :: r2 -> (l2 = nil /\ x = y /\ r1 = r2) + {m : list X | l2 = x :: m /\ r1 = m ++ y :: r2} list_first_dec : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall (a : X) (ll : list X), P a -> In a ll -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ P x /\ (forall y : X, In y l -> ~ P y)}}} list_pick : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k < length ll -> {x : X & {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ length l = k}}} map_eq_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (l1 l2 : list B), map f l = l1 ++ l2 -> exists l1' l2' : list A, l = l1' ++ l2' /\ map f l1' = l1 /\ map f l2' = l2 list_split_length : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k <= length ll -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ length l = k}}
